body: The fuck is this dipshit, while I do hate and think that rito is such a shitty pathetic loser failure dipshit of a male, I hate ntr more than I hate rito so fuck this shit and I hope whoever made this shit get tortured for eternity, also @Climacus have you been thinking that all doujin are canon, the fuck is wrong with your brain, go get a new for fuck sake
This is beautiful. Rito deserved to be cucked.  I wish there was more
I wish there was one more chapter
This is the only NTR I approve of. Female characters in tlr are great but then you get Rito who is a dumb-fuck and such a bad protagonist that even principal is better than him.
One of the rare ntr that i actually dont mind mainly cuz the girls wasnt his in the first place

Rito deserves to be NTR'd until the end of time. He was naked in a closet with Haruna(also naked) and walked out of that, virginity intact. As far as i'm concerned Netorare end is the true ending.

@Climacus. All doujins are non-canon, dude.  Have you...... Have you been thinking all doujins are canon up to this point?

Non-canonical garbage.
It has no credibility.
@nyan_san why does he deserve it i mean i still fapped but dont und stand why he deserve it now kirito yea but rito ehhhhhh
the second the principal would lift a finger upon Darkness there wouldn't be a finger of the principal to be found.
Can you do the rest of the series
You should look at it from the bright side, Momo's harem plan finally worked just not for Rito. And frankly principal deserves this after all the abuse he has gone through in the manga.

Finally translated , thank you 
Rito geting NTR is the most obvius thing that can happen.

Actually, it would rock to have a third "To Love-Ru" series that is all about Rito having to protect his harem from being taken, forcing him to acknowledge they ARE a harem.  Come on, if "In Another World With My Smartphone" can have a protag with nine wives then why can't Rito have a harem that includes his little sister?
Im not into NTR and even less in senseless NTR
